Metadata.Title: CVE-2020-28458 affecting package reaper for versions less than 3.1.1-15
Metadata.Description: CVE-2020-28458 affecting package reaper for versions less than 3.1.1-15. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package reaper is earlier than 3.1.1-15, affected by CVE-2020-28458
